input.sentences: i went to the bike race today .
there were a ton of bikes there .
everyone was trying very hard to win .
afterward we all got together to chat .
we had some refreshments while we were there .
output.sentences: Today we competed in a bike race.
There were a ton of contestants on bikes all with the goal to win in mind.
Getting the win may be hard but we all had fun no matter what we placed.
Afterward we gathered with our friends to chat and discuss the event.
The best part of the whole day were the homade refreshments.
